paragraphs.body: The Fire Nation is ruled by one leader, also called the Fire Lord; the Fire Lord is the supreme leader of the country with no one above him or her. The Fire Lord's Heir is their firstborn child, however, if the child is banished or other circumstances stand in the way of the Heir, the next child or person appointed by the current Fire Lord would become the next, as in the case of Zuko.
